series_title: Engineering Reports: Miscellaneous
series_description: This series documents engineering reports not included in series. This series may include, but is not limited to: Infiltration and Inflow (I&I) studies, planning documents, and system analyses.
retention_statement: 10 Years after end of calendar year

series_title: Industrial Pretreatment Permit Program Locality Submittals & Approvals
series_description: This series documents the application process for municipal publicly-owned treatment works (POTW) point source facilities and their Virginia Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (VPDES) permits, which carry the pretreatment program requirements. This series may include, but is not limited to: program approval submittals comprised of legal authority, program procedures, funding, local limits enforcement response plan, and list of significant industrial users; program approval letters; jurisdiction program administrative procedures; and inter-jurisdictional agreements.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Industrial Pretreatment Permit Program Records & Reports
series_description: This series documents reports submitted to the agency pertaining to the commonwealth's municipal publicly-owned treatment works (POTW) point source discharge facilities and their VPDES permits, which carry the pretreatment program requirements. This series may include, but is not limited to: locality-developed fact sheets, permits, and transmittal letters; meeting memoranda; tax exemption requests and certification letters, industrial user discharge monitoring reports (DMRs); operator bench and lab sheets; annual audit, and quarterly program status reports; categorical industrial user and significant industrial user inspections; pollution complaints; pollution response (PReP) inspection reports; warning letters; correspondence; notices of violations (NOVs); and actions.
retention_statement: 12 Years after expiration

series_title: Industrial Pretreatment Permit Program Guidance
series_description: This series documents current guidance for the Industrial Pretreatment Permit Program oversight procedures. This may include, but is not limited to: the Pretreatment Permit Manual and program guidance/advice memoranda.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Local Review Program Agreements
series_description: This series documents agreement between DEQ and a locality regarding the delegation of review approval for connections to, or extensions off, existing sewerage system projects. This series may include, but is not limited to: signed agreements.
retention_statement: 0 Years after expiration

series_title: New Waste Water Technologies Reviews
series_description: This series documents the review process of new wastewater technologies. This series may include, but is not limited to: provisional approvals, performance data reviews, shop drawings, performance testing, financial assurance, and correspondence.
retention_statement: 0 Years after event

series_title: Nutrient Banking: History
series_description: This series documents the operational history of nutrient generating activity areas, including site requirements, enforcement activity, and case decisions. This series may include, but is not limited to, registered deed restrictions, nutrient bank credit approvals and releases, and completed applications.

series_title: Nutrient Banking: Operations
series_description: This series documents the calculating, granting, and releasing for sale of nutrient bank credits, which involves the evaluation plans for and impacts on land conversion and other nutrient banking credit-generating activities. This series may include, is not limited to, application components, correspondence, monitoring and inspection reports, and registries.
retention_statement: 10 Years after receipt

series_title: Operation and Maintenance Manuals Sewerage Systems Treatment Works
series_description: This series documents the prescribed operation of sewerage systems and treatment works. This series may include, but is not limited to: operating manuals.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Preliminary Engineering Report (PER) Approval Package
series_description: This series documents the approval of a Preliminary Engineering Report (PER). This series may include, but is not limited to: approved reports, correspondence, and approval letters.
retention_statement: 5 Years after event

series_title: Sewage Collection and Treatment Regulations CTC Letter/Certificate
series_description: This series documents the approval for construction of a sewage treatment works or sewerage collection system. This series may include, but is not limited to: approval letters, certificates, and local review program approved project lists

series_title: Sewage Collection and Treatment Regulations CTO Approval Letter/Certificate
series_description: This series documents the approval for operation of a sewage treatment works or sewerage collection system. This series may include, but is not limited to: approval letters and certificates

series_title: Sewage Collection and Treatment Regulations: CTC Engineering Plans
series_description: This series documents construction of a sewage treatment works or sewerage collection system. This series may include, but is not limited to: approved engineering plans
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_title: Sewage Collection and Treatment Regulations: CTC Other documentation
series_description: This series documents the design calculations for the construction of sewage collection systems. This series may include, but is not limited to: design calculations, related correspondence, reference material, engineering reports, and agency review notes
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_title: Sewage Collection and Treatment Regulations: Facility Plans Approval Letter/Certificate The series
series_description: documents the closure of sewage treatment and the verification thereof. This series may include, but is not limited to: approval letters and certificates, approved engineering plans, design calculations, engineering reports, agency review notes.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_title: Sewage Collection and Treatment Regulations: Gravity Sewer Projects Supporting Approval Package
series_description: This series documents the granting of waivers from requirements to secure design, construction, and operation approvals for sewerage and treatment works. This series may include, but is not limited to: design calculations and review notes.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_title: Sewage Collection and Treatment Regulations: NonConstruction Projects
series_description: This series documents sewage collection and treatment regulations. This series may include, but is not limited to: approval letter and/or certificate, engineering plans and specifications, design calculations.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_title: Sewage Collection and Treatment Regulations: Related Technical Specifications
series_description: This series documents sewage collection and treatment regulations. This series may include, but is not limited to: technical specifications in the construction of a sewage collection and treatment facility/project.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_title: Sewer System Maps
series_description: This series documents the sewer system for a particular sewage collection and treatment facility/project. This series include, but is not limited to: maps.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_title: Standard Specifications
series_description: This series documents standard construction specifications submitted by utilities or local governments. This series may include, but is not limited to: approved standard specifications, approval letter, and associated documentation.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_title: Virginia Pollutant Discharge Elimination System Individual & General Permits Manuals & Plans
series_description: This series documents the agency's delegated responsibilities pertaining to the commonwealth's municipal and industrial source discharge facilities. This series may include, but is not limited to: operations and maintenance manuals, ground water monitoring plans, ground water remediation plans, storm water pollution prevention plans, and best management practices plans. PL 92-500
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Virginia Pollutant Discharge Elimination System Individual & General Permits Records/Reports Confidential
series_description: This series documents the confidential portion of materials taken into account in the review of an application for a Virginia Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (VPDES) permit for municipal and industrial point source discharge facilities. This series may include, but is not limited to: financial statements, financial sureties, and proprietary information concerning technologies. PL 92-500
retention_statement: 12 Years after creation

series_title: Virginia Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (VPDES) Individual & General Permits Program Guidance
series_description: This series documents current guidance for applicants for Virginia Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (VPDES) permit processing, monitoring, and compliance activities. This series may include, but is not limited to: VPDES permit compliance inspection manual, procedures, templates, and program guidance/advice memorandum.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Virginia Pollutant Discharge Elimination System: Individual and General Permits Records/Reports Non-confidential
series_description: This series documents the agency's responsibilities delegated from the federal Environmental Protection Agency pertaining the commonwealth's municipal, industrial point source discharge facilities. This series may include, but is not limited site visit reports, field notes/logs, correspondence, meeting memoranda, TMP data/reports, ground water data/reports, tax exemption requests and certification letters, plans and specifications, conceptual engineering reports, discharge monitoring reports (DMRs), lab sheets, operator bench sheets, inspection reports (technical, lab and sampling) with documentation, DMR Quality Assurance Study results, Virginia Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (VPDES) audit memoranda, pollution complaints, pollution response (PREP) inspection reports, warning letters, notices of violations and enforcement actions. PL 92-500; 62.1 44
retention_statement: 12 Years after creation

series_title: Virginia Pollutant Discharge Elimination System: Individual and General Permits Permanent
series_description: This series documents the case decision process for Virginia Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (VPDES) permits by municipal and industrial point source discharge facilities. This series may include, but is not limited to: individual permit applications and supplemental information (maps and plan sheets), general permit registration statements and supplemental information (maps and plan sheets), permits and transmittal letters, fact sheets, transmittal letters, no-exposure certifications, facility closure plans, and associated approval letters. PL 92-500; 62.1 44

series_title: Virginia Pollution Abatement (VPA) Individual and General Permits Manuals and Plans
series_description: This series documents the operational guidance of the commonwealth's industrial, confined animal feeding, poultry, and biosolids non-point source facilities in support of a Virginia Pollution Abatement (VPA) permit application. This series include but is not limited to: operations and maintenance manuals, ground water monitoring plans, ground water remediation plans, and best management practices plans.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Virginia Pollution Abatement (VPA) Individual and General Permits Permanent
series_description: This series documents the agency's issuance of permits for commonwealth's industrial, confined animal feeding, poultry, and biosolids non-point source facilities. This series may include but is not limited to: individual permit applications and supplemental information (maps and plan sheets), general permit registration statements and supplemental information (maps and plan sheets), permits and transmittal letters, fact sheets, facility closure plans, and associated approval letters. 62.1 44

series_title: Virginia Pollution Abatement (VPA) Individual and General Permits Program Guidance
series_description: This series documents current guidance for Virginia Pollution Abatement (VPA) permit processing, monitoring, and compliance activities. This series may include, but is not to: VPA Permit Manual, Compliance Inspection Manual, procedures, templates, and program guidance/advice memoranda.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Virginia Pollution Abatement (VPA) Individual and General Permits Records & Reports Confidential
series_description: This series documents the confidential portion of the materials taken into account in the review of Virginia Pollution (VPA) permit applications for the commonwealth's industrial, confined animal feeding, and poultry non-point source This series may include, but is not limited to: financial statements, financial sureties, and proprietary information concerning technologies.
retention_statement: 22 Years after creation

series_title: Virginia Pollution Abatement (VPA) Individual and General Permits Records & Reports Non-confidential
series_description: This series documents the non-confidential portion of the materials taken into account in the review of Virginia Pollution Abatement (VPA) permit applications for the commonwealth's industrial confined animal feeding, poultry, and biosolids nonpoint source facilities. This series may include, but is not to: site visit reports, field notes/logs, correspondence, meeting memoranda, ground water data/reports, tax exemption and certification letters, plans and specifications, conceptual engineering reports, monitoring reports, lab sheets, operator bench sheets, inspection reports (technical, lab, and sampling) with supporting documentation, VPA audit memoranda, pollution complaints, pollution response (PReP) inspection reports, warning letters, notices of violations (NOVs), and enforcement actions.
retention_statement: 22 Years after expiration

series_title: Virginia Water Protection (VWP) Individual and General Permit Final Spatial Records
series_description: This series documents the spatial location, geographical and type (e.g. Cowardin classification) of final authorized impacts and permittee-responsible mitigation projects in surface waters, including wetlands. This series may include, but is not limited to: final authorized impact maps; final maps permittee-responsible mitigation area; final mitigation area asbuilt surveys; protective instruments, easements, and restrictions, and GIS shape files. 62.1 44

series_title: Virginia Water Protection (VWP) Individual and General
series_description: This series documents the agency's management of Virginia Water Protection (VWP) permits, from application to termination or expiration. This series may include but is not limited to: joint permit applications, including Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) applications, and information such as maps and plan sheets; fact sheets; transmittal, preconstruction, final construction, project completion, and warning letters; preconstruction, construction monitoring, and pollution complaints and inspection reports; wetland and/or stream mitigation plans and reports; ground water data/reports; correspondence; NOVs; and enforcement actions.
retention_statement: 5 Years after expiration

series_title: Virginia Water Protection (VWP) Individual Water Withdrawal Permits
series_description: This series documents the agency's protection of water within surface waters. This series may include, but is not to: joint permit applications, including Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) applications, and information such as maps and plan sheets; fact sheets; transmittal, preconstruction, final construction, project completion, and warning letters; preconstruction, construction monitoring, and pollution complaints and inspection reports; wetland and/or stream mitigation plans and reports; ground water data/reports; correspondence; warning letters; and notices of violation (NOVs).
retention_statement: 32 Years after issuance

series_title: Virginia Water Protection (VWP) No Permit Required
series_description: This series documents the agency's decision, after receiving application, that a Virginia Water Protection (VWP) permit is not required. This series may include but is not limited to: permit applications, additional related submittals, and correspondence.
retention_statement: 1 Year after event

series_title: Virginia Water Protection (VWP) Non-Permitted Sites: Compliance
series_description: This series documents the complaints, inspections, and investigations of potential violations of State Water Control and VWP Program Regulations on sites without VWP permit coverage. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports, reviews, correspondence, and case history.
retention_statement: 5 Years after closed

series_title: Virginia Water Protection (VWP) Non-Permitted Sites: PreApplication
series_description: This series documents site visits and exclusion /jurisdictional determinations for projects that are proposed to the prior to the submittal of an application for a VWP permit. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports, determinations, correspondence, and case history.
retention_statement: 5 Years after closed

series_title: Virginia Water Protection (VWP) Permit Program Guidance Records
series_description: This series documents current guidance for the Virginia Water Protection (VWP) permit processing procedures and regulations. This series may include, but is not limited to: the VWP Permit Manual and program guidance/advice
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Virginia Water Protection (VWP) Wetlands and Streams Mitigation Banks Confidential
series_description: This series documents the confidential portion of the for and the approval, establishment, and monitoring of mitigation banks, including technologies used during construction or monitoring, that is are taken into account when reviewing a proposed mitigation bank. This series may but is not limited to: financial statements and sureties, forms, and correspondence.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Virginia Water Protection (VWP) Wetlands and Streams Mitigation Banks Non-Confidential
series_description: This series documents the non-confidential portion of the application for and the approval, establishment, and of mitigation banks. This series may include, but is not limited to: agreements, applications, reports, and correspondence.

series_title: Water Supply Planning
series_description: This series documents the division's water-supply planning program, which includes submissions from the public, and/or planning regions; compliance review, cumulative impact analysis outreach, five-year updates, local and regional water supply plans, and annual water resources and withdrawal. series may include, but is not limited to: reports and plans.
retention_statement: 12 Years after approval
